contact.presentation: Hello! I consider myself a creative, responsible and initiative person. I completed my studies in several professional courses and I always keep learning to improve my skills more and more.
contact.description: I am a web developer who always keeps learning new things. Growing as a professional is one of my goals, so no idea is so crazy that it's impossible. What do you have in mind?
contact.title: Contact
contact.phrase: Setting goals is the first step to turning the invisible into the visible
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject

services.dev: I can design your web page from scratch using the most appropriate programming languages.
services.title: Web development
services.content: I have worked for multiple blogs in Spain as a writer and editor. I have more than 4 years of work exprience.
services.webs: Websites in which I have participated
services.design: I can handle the design principles to do high quality work using the most appropriate programs to meet Front-End objectives.
services.arq: I am a professional Architect, graduated from the José Antonio Páez University. I am qualified to create modern designs regarding buildings for tourism, education, sports, residential and commercial.
services.arqPart: , a new architectural firm focused on contemporary architecture.

nova.description: This is a project that is currently in process. It is a web page focused for an architecture company called Nova Architecture, which requires a well-developed design that must maintain the professional essence with the architectural environment. Web development has been done with technologies like HTML, TAILWINDCSS, REACT and more.

weather.description: In this weather application you can check the weather anywhere in the world, either in real time or the forecast for future days. For the creation of this project I used technologies such as HTML, TailWindCSS, JavaScript, React and elements from Luxon, IconScout, React Toastify and Openweather API.
weather.type: World Weather Application in real time

movies.description: This project has functionalities for searching, editing, deleting and more... In this case, they have been made with React Hooks and LocalStorage, as well as HTML, CSS and Javascript.

chat.description: Chat App is an application created with real-time functionality to send messages to registered users. To achieve this, technologies such as HTML, SASS, JS, REACT and FIREBASE were applied.
